title: Pangram
description: Determine if a sentence is a pangram

tests.description_html: An empty sentence is not a pangram.
tests.name: Empty sentence

tests.description_html: A perfect lowercase alphabet is a pangram.
tests.name: Perfect lowercase

tests.description_html: A sentence with only lowercase letters covering all letters is a pangram.
tests.name: Only lowercase
args: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

tests.description_html: A sentence missing the letter 'x' is not a pangram.
tests.name: Missing letter 'x'
args: a quick movement of the enemy will jeopardize five gunboats

tests.description_html: A sentence missing the letter 'h' is not a pangram.
tests.name: Missing letter 'h'
args: five boxing wizards jump quickly at it

tests.description_html: A string with 'a' to 'm' in lowercase and uppercase is not a pangram.
tests.name: Missing letters beyond a-m

tests.description_html: A pangram sentence with numbers included.
tests.name: With numbers
args: the 1 quick brown fox jumps over the 2 lazy dogs

tests.description_html: A sentence where letters are replaced by numbers is not a pangram.
tests.name: Numbers replacing letters
args: 7h3 qu1ck brown fox jumps ov3r 7h3 lazy dog

tests.description_html: A pangram with mixed case and punctuation.
tests.name: Mixed case and punctuation
args: Five quacking Zephyrs jolt my wax bed.

tests.description_html: A case-insensitive sentence without all letters is not a pangram.
tests.name: Case insensitive missing letters
args: the quick brown fox jumps over with lazy FX
